key_phrases: application questions tend to be redundant
bring panelists/judges who understand the art community
panelists have no idea of the expenses artists take on
should not be expected that the free public event be a large part of our budget
barriers_identified: panelists lacking understanding of art community and expenses
requirement for free public event to be a large part of budget
solutions_proposed: select panelists/judges who understand the art community
adjust expectations for budget allocation to free public events
